short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your random thoughts & ideas, structured by AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your cluttered thoughts into clear, actionable text notes with Audionotes, the ultimate productivity tool powered by AI. With Audionotes, you can effortlessly capture voice notes, upload audio files, or create text notes, and watch as they're magically transformed into neatly summarized and structured text notes tailored to your preferences.

Key Features:

- Record, upload, or write: Capture voice notes upto 60 minutes, upload audio files uto 500 mb in size, or create text notes effortlessly in 19 languages.
- Smart transcripts: Enjoy speaker-segregated transcripts for easy reference.
- Generate awesome content: Create emails, social media posts, meeting minutes, and more with custom prompts.
- Seamless integrations: Connect with Zapier, Notion, and more to streamline your workflow.
- Your very own AI assistant: Use Magic Chat for contextual search and Q&A to enhance productivity.
- Use the way you like: Use Audionotes on Web, Mobile, Chrome Extension or on Whatsapp (Pro only)

Audionotes is your perfect note-taking assistant and companion. Get Audionotes now and revolutionize the way you organize your thoughts
